name: Steeped in Books
description: Drop in for informal talk and tea to share your thoughts about what you're reading. Don't know what to read? Here's a perfect opportunity to pick up a few recommendations.

name: Café au Lit
description: Can't wait to tell someone about the great book you just read, or don't know what to read next? Come to a different kind of book club where you can read what you like and find out what others are reading at the same time. Join us for coffee, conversation and companionship. It's a great way to get recommendations for trying new genres and authors. It's also a great venue for telling people about that book you just finished that you want EVERYBODY to read!

name: Book Circle
description: Settle in for a story or two and some hands-on activities. Programs begin on time, for best experience we recommend you do too! Program length is approximately 1 hour.

name: Mother - Daughter Book Club
description: Bring your mom and discuss what you're reading with the group. Programs begin on time, for best experience we recommend you do too! Program length is approximately 1.5 hours.

name: NBTween Book Club
description: A monthly informal book discussion for avid tween readers and their interested adults. Programs begin on time, for best experience we recommend you do too! Program length is approximately 1 hour. Recommended for ages 8-12 and their adults.

name: Teen Book Club
description: A monthy informal book discussion for avid teen readers.

name: Barking Book Buddies
description:
Certified Austin Dog Alliance volunteer teams with trained therapy dogs will be waiting for kids to read stories to them. This program improves children’s reading and communication skills by employing a powerful method: reading to a dog. Open to children of all reading levels.

Voluntarios del “Austin Dog Alliance” estarán esperando a todos aquellos niños y niñas que quieran venir a leerles a perros entrenados. Se ha comprobado que este poderoso método ayuda a que los niños mejoren su capacidad de comunicarse con otras personas y también a que eleven su nivel de lectura.

name: YA For Adults Book Club
description: Do you put the adult in YA? Then YAFA is for you! Please join us for some excellent literary conversation.
